entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023
